com.hexaware.controller

Class Controller<IncidentID>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hexaware.controller.Controller<IncidentID>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICrimeAnalysisService

    public abstract class Controller<IncidentID>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICrimeAnalysisService
    This abstract class represents a controller for managing crime analysis service. It provides methods to interact with incidents and reports.

        public void addIncidents(Incidents incident)

      • removeIncidents

        public void removeIncidents(Incidents incident)
        Removes an incident from the list of available incidents.
        Parameters:
        incident - The incident to be removed.

      • listAvailable

        public void listAvailable()
        Lists all available incidents. If no incidents are available, it prints a message indicating so.
        Specified by:
        listAvailable in interface ICrimeAnalysisService

      • searchIncidentByID

        public Incidents searchIncidentByID(int incidentID)
        Searches for an incident by its ID.
        Parameters:
        incidentID - The ID of the incident to search for.
        Returns:
        The incident with the specified ID if found, or null if not found or an SQL exception occurs.

      • generateIncidentReport

        public void generateIncidentReport(Incidents incident)
        Generates incident reports for the specified incident.
        Parameters:
        incident - The incident for which reports are to be generated.
